dcterms:creator: J. M. Zelle
R. J. Mooney
dcterms:description: GEOQUERY contains 880 questions about US geography, using the FunQL formalism. The dataset is used to evaluate compositional generalization in semantic parsing.
dcterms:title: GEOQUERY

dcterms:creator: B. M. Lake
M. Baroni
dcterms:description: SCAN-SP contains natural language navigation commands mapped to action sequences. It is used to evaluate compositional generalization in semantic parsing.
dcterms:title: SCAN-SP

dcterms:creator: D. Bahdanau
H. de Vries
T. J. Oâ€™Donnell
S. Murty
P. Beaudoin
Y. Bengio
A. Courville
dcterms:description: CLOSURE includes new question templates created by combining referring expressions of various types from CLEVR in new ways. It is used to assess systematic generalization.
dcterms:title: CLOSURE

dcterms:creator: J. Johnson
B. Hariharan
L. van der Maaten
L. Fei-Fei
C. L. Zitnick
R. Girshick
dcterms:description: CLEVR contains synthetic questions created using templates over synthetic images with multiple objects of different shapes, colors, materials, and sizes. It is used for evaluating compositional language and visual reasoning.
dcterms:title: CLEVR
